Package arcade.vis

Class Panel

java.lang.Object
arcade.vis.Panel
Direct Known Subclasses:
Panel.Panel2D
public abstract class Panel
extends java.lang.Object
Wrapper for JFrame windows containing visualizations.

Each JFrame object is generated by a Display object from the MASON library. Each Panel is a window that can contain one or more drawings made by Drawer objects. The Visualization creates all Panel objects, then attaches Drawer objects to their assigned Panel.

Since:
2.2
Version:
2.3.0
